display_name: Medical Outcomes Study SF-36: Role limitations due to emotional problem subscale standardized score
description:
The subscale score is based on 3 items from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). A high score suggests the participant has "no problems with work or other daily activities as a result of emotional problems in the past 4 weeks ". [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/shhs/variables?search=mossf36)
